title: Ultraviolette elevates Vinayak Bhat as chief product officer
description: Vinayak Bhat has been appointed as chief product officer at Ultraviolette, an electric vehicle and battery technology firm. He previously held the positions of technical director and principal engineer. Bhat's role will involve expanding the product portfolio and he played a key part in the F77 and F77 Mach 2 launches. His career commenced at ISRO in 2013.
